data.persona: I am given more responsibility than the other knights. I take charge when I need to. I am brave and loyal.
data.description:
You are in the Beach House.
A marvelous beach house that sits upon the fine white sand of the beach. It looks mighty expensive, as the house has solid gold walls. A gigantic and lavish marble pier extends into the ocean out in front of the house.
There's a pier, a large and well stocked wine rack, a beach, an ocean, a gigantic and lavish marble pier, a fine white sand, a luxuriously soft couch, some walls, and some sand here.
A manservant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an old armor, and wielding a bow, a shield, and a sword of the guards.
data.goal: put bow on large and well stocked wine rack
